title.rendered: IPMU 2024: Special Session on Imprecise Probabilities

content.rendered:
The IMPU 2024 conference:

International Conference on Information Processing and Management of Uncertainty in Knowledge-Based Systems 2024

will take place during July 22-24, 2024 in Lisbon (Portugal). In the IPMU2023 website you may find relevant information about the conference. As in the last editions, Enrique Miranda and Ignacio Montes are organising a special session on Imprecise Probabilities:

Theorical and applied aspects of Imprecise Probabilities

This session is dedicated to papers that either present a significant advance in the foundations of Imprecise Probabilities or demonstrate potential applications in real-world problems of these methods. Of course, papers showing the connection between imprecise probabilities and other fields such as fuzzy sets or game theory are welcome, as well as papers related to possibility measures or Dempster-Shafer’s Evidence theory.

We hope this special session to attract the attention of researchers and, hopefully, it will be again one of the more numerous sessions of the conference!
